hero.title: Prepare Smarter. Live Better.
hero.subtitle: We bring Swiss quality and valuable free time back to your school day.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: Sunday afternoons at your desk? Nights spent formatting worksheets? We believe: Great teaching doesn't mean sacrificing yourself.
mission.paragraph2: The demands on Swiss educators are constantly increasing. Individualization, digitalization, and administrative hurdles require time – time that's often missing in everyday life. This is exactly where EasyLehrer comes in.
mission.paragraph3: We see ourselves as your digital assistant. We bridge the gap between high didactic standards and limited preparation time. Our goal is to have your back, so you can invest your energy where it's needed most: with your students.

value1.title: Time Savings, Not Stress
value1.description: Our materials are ready to use immediately. Find, print, teach. Your evening belongs to you again.

value2.title: 100% Lehrplan 21
value2.description: No converting Euros to Francs or adapting content. Our materials are tailored specifically for Switzerland.

value3.title: Teacher-Verified
value3.description: We offer quality over quantity. Every material undergoes a quality check by experienced educators.

origin.title: From Practice, For Practice
origin.paragraph1: EasyLehrer is not an anonymous tech corporation. The platform emerged from a genuine need: colleagues were looking for a central hub for modern Swiss teaching materials, without having to wade through confusing databases.
origin.paragraph2: What started as a small exchange has become a growing community. We connect creativity with didactics and ensure that good work is fairly rewarded.

founders.title: Who's Behind EasyLehrer?
founders.paragraph1: We are two founders with different but perfectly complementary backgrounds: one of us comes from computer science, the other from education. Together, we recognized how much time and energy teachers invest in preparation every day — often at the expense of their own free time and quality of life.
founders.paragraph2: From this realization, the idea for EasyLehrer was born. We wanted to create a platform that truly makes teachers' daily lives easier: thoughtfully designed, practical, and tailored to Swiss needs.
founders.paragraph3: But we also know: a great platform isn't built in isolation. That's why your opinion is invaluable to us. Only through your feedback, ideas, and experiences from everyday school life can we continuously improve EasyLehrer. Together, we're building a platform that truly works — for you and with you.
founders.highlight: Your expertise makes the difference. Let's transform the teaching profession together.
